OpenSearchDescription.Description: This extension installs AppAgg's search engine in the browser and allows to search apps and developers directly form the search bar.
OpenSearchDescription.Attribution: The Intellectual Property Rights over the results retrieved by using this extension, as well as the distinctive signs & trademarks included in it belongs to queried website owners. By using this extension you agree on the Terms Of Service of the queried website.
OpenSearchDescription.Tags: apps, developers, discounts, android, ios, windows, macos, linux, windows phone, google play, app store, windows store
